an3.85:1.1: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an3.85:2.2: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, sekho hotī”ti?
an3.85:2.5: Adhisīlampi sikkhati, adhicittampi sikkhati, adhipaññampi sikkhati.
an3.85:2.6: Sikkhatīti kho, bhikkhu, tasmā sekhoti vuccatīti.
